LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Large.label: USAC supply crate (L)
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Large.description: A sealed supply crate used by USAC for air-dropping equipment and materials. Left behind after mining operations. Can be opened to claim the contents.
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Large_Empty.label: empty USAC supply crate (L)
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Large_Empty.description: An empty USAC supply crate. Provides some cover.
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Medium.label: USAC supply crate (M)
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Medium.description: A sealed supply crate used by USAC for air-dropping equipment and materials. Left behind after mining operations. Can be opened to claim the contents.
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Medium_Empty.label: empty USAC supply crate (M)
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Medium_Empty.description: An empty USAC supply crate. Provides some cover.
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Small.label: USAC supply crate (S)
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Small.description: A sealed supply crate used by USAC for air-dropping equipment and materials. Left behind after mining operations. Can be opened to claim the contents.
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Small_Empty.label: empty USAC supply crate (S)
LanguageData.USAC_Crate_Small_Empty.description: An empty USAC supply crate. Provides some cover.
